import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlaylistSection.module.css' import VideoCard from "../VideoCard/VideoCard"; import { PLAYLIST_API} from "../../Utils/APIEndpoints"; class PlaylistSection extends React.Component { state = { response : [], } componentDidMount() { axios.get(PLAYLIST_API) .then((response) => { this.setState({ response : response.data }) }) this.props.history.push('/1') } render() { return(
{this.state.response.map(data => )}
) } } export default PlaylistSection;
